slide1.title: Training Tomorrow's Leaders for African Development
slide1.subtitle: Senghor University has been training high-level African executives in sustainable development for over 30 years.

slide2.title: Academic Excellence in Service of Africa
slide2.subtitle: Internationally recognized Master's programs taught by world-renowned experts.

slide3.title: A Network of 5000+ Graduates Worldwide
slide3.subtitle: Join a dynamic community of professionals committed to the development of the African continent.

slide4.title: Alexandria, Crossroads of Cultures and Knowledge
slide4.subtitle: Study in a unique setting, in the heart of one of the most iconic cities of the Mediterranean.

history.title: History
history.subtitle: Discover the origins and evolution of Senghor University, born from an ambitious vision for the development of Francophone Africa.

genesis.title: The 70s-80s Project
genesis.description: The project to create a French-speaking university dedicated to African development was born at the Summit of Heads of State and Government of French-speaking countries, held in May 1989 in Dakar. This ambitious initiative aimed to provide Africa with a higher education institution capable of training highly qualified African executives.
genesis.point1: Initiative born at the Francophonie Summit in Dakar
genesis.point2: Vision of excellence to train tomorrow's African leaders

founders.title: The Founding Fathers
founders.subtitle: Visionary figures who shaped the institution

senghor.role: Poet, thinker and former President of Senegal

usenghor.title: USenghor Project
usenghor.description: Senghor University officially opens its doors in Alexandria, Egypt. It bears the name of Léopold Sédar Senghor, a major figure in the Francophonie, who played a central role in promoting French-speaking identity around the world.

milestone1.title: Opening in Alexandria
milestone1.desc: October 1990 - The university welcomes its first students

milestone2.title: Reference in training
milestone2.desc: Over 30 years of excellence in development professions

legacy.title: An Enduring Mission
legacy.description: For over 30 years, Senghor University has pursued its ambitious mission: training future African and Francophone executives capable of meeting major development challenges, while strengthening ties between Africa and the international Francophonie.

mission.title: Mission & Values
mission.subtitle: For over 30 years, we have been training tomorrow's African leaders

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Train, in French, creative executives capable of meeting the challenges of sustainable development in Africa.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Become a major player in the training and capacity building of executives in Africa and for Africa.

experience.title: The Senghor Experience
experience.description: A unique educational experience with professional immersion, creativity projects and much more.

campus.title: Campus & Network
campus.subtitle: From Egypt to Sub-Saharan Africa, discover our network of campuses and academic partners across the continent.

governance.title: Governance
governance.subtitle: A solid and transparent governance structure in service of academic excellence

foundingTexts.title: Founding Texts
foundingTexts.description: Senghor University was created by the Conference of Heads of State and Government of French-speaking countries at the Dakar Summit in May 1989. Its statutes and operations are governed by founding texts that guarantee its academic independence and mission in service of African development.
foundingTexts.point1: Constitutive Charter adopted at the Dakar Summit (1989)
foundingTexts.point2: University Statutes approved by the OIF
foundingTexts.point3: Headquarters Agreement with the Arab Republic of Egypt

donorCountries.title: Donor Countries
donorCountries.description: Senghor University benefits from the financial support of many member countries of the Francophonie

board.title: Board of Directors
board.description: The Board of Directors defines the general policy of the University and ensures its good governance

footer.description: Senghor University has been training high-level African executives committed to sustainable development of the continent for over 30 years.
